sentences.sentence: This colorful game will gladden all the fans of this game genre.
sentences.translation: 这丰富多彩的游戏将这个游戏流派的所有球迷欢欣鼓舞。

sentences.sentence: It already amounted to selling his soul when he was unable to gladden it.
sentences.translation: 无法取悦自己灵魂之时便等于是出卖它。

sentences.sentence: Some of the figures gladden the heart - in 2007, 30 men aged 80 or over got married for the first time.
sentences.translation: 其中有些数据让人捧腹，在2007年有30个80或80岁以上的男人举行他们人生中的第一次婚礼。
